messages.title: The Tories' plans for immediate cuts
messages.content: The Tories' plans for immediate cuts would put your job, your public services and your living standards at risk.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour stands for making Britain a fairer place. A lot is at stake as Gordon Brown pulls us out of the worst recession in many years - so make sure you get out and vote on May 6th.

images.caption: The Tories' plans for immediate cuts would put your job, your public services and your living standards at risk.
